subMembers.name: autoScroll
subMembers.description: Enables automatic scrolling while dragging an item beyond the viewport.

subMembers.name: boundary
subMembers.description: Specifies a DOM element that limits the dragging area.

subMembers.name: container
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom container in which the draggable item should be rendered.

subMembers.name: contentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [contentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: contentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [contentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: cursorOffset
subMembers.description: Specifies the cursor offset from the dragged item.

subMembers.name: x
subMembers.description: Specifies the horizontal cursor offset from the dragged item in pixels.

subMembers.name: y
subMembers.description: Specifies the vertical cursor offset from the dragged item in pixels.

subMembers.name: dragDirection
subMembers.description: Specifies the directions in which an item can be dragged.

subMembers.name: group
subMembers.description: Allows you to group several UI components, so that users can drag and drop items between them.

subMembers.name: handle
subMembers.description: Specifies a CSS selector (ID or class) that should act as the drag handle(s) for the item(s).

subMembers.name: scrollSensitivity
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance in pixels from the edge of viewport at which scrolling should start. Applies only if [autoScroll] is **true**.

subMembers.name: scrollSpeed
subMembers.description: Specifies the scrolling speed when dragging an item beyond the viewport. Applies only if [autoScroll] is **true**.
